C

CEMENT - Static variable in class project.chenlin_17.Views.GeneralBuilder
Use number 3 to stand for CEMENT Brick type.
Increases readability for brick type.
CEMENT_STRENGTH - Static variable in class project.chenlin_17.Views.CementBrick
Define brick's max strength
CementBrick - Class in project.chenlin_17.Views
This cement brick class is the concrete class extends from the brick class.
It contains crack property.
CementBrick(Point2D, Dimension2D, Group) - Constructor for class project.chenlin_17.Views.CementBrick
This constructor builds the cement brick(with defined boarder color and inner color) and adds its view to the game board.
CementBrick(Point2D, Dimension2D, Image, Group) - Constructor for class project.chenlin_17.Views.CementBrick
This constructor builds the image cement brick and adds its view to the game board.
changeBGMVolume() - Method in enum class project.chenlin_17.tools.SoundEffect
This function implements the volume change behaviour by calculating the volume that set by the player.
changeStyle(Button, String, String) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.PowerUpController
This function changes the buttons style using the passed in style class.
CharacterOptions - Enum Class in project.chenlin_17.tools
Each constructor set have its defined value for character image and paddle image, since they are designed to bind with each other.
The player is able to set the paddle image by choosing the character
CharacterOptions(String, String) - Constructor for enum class project.chenlin_17.tools.CharacterOptions
This constructor sets the person image and player image for the specific theme set.
CharacterOptionsController - Class in project.chenlin_17.Controller
This class is the controller of the character option page
CharacterOptionsController() - Constructor for class project.chenlin_17.Controller.CharacterOptionsController
 
checkNull(String) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.LogInController
This function checks whether the player has input text or not.
checkStatus(String, String) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.LogInController
This function checks whether the name and the password are valid.
If the name and the password are new, then it will be newly added into the file.
If the name and the password corresponds, then the player will be directed to the index page with the user's name set.
If the name and the password doesn't correspond, the warning message will be shown

CITY - Enum constant in enum class project.chenlin_17.tools.SoundEffect

ClayBrick - Class in project.chenlin_17.Views
This clay brick class is the concrete class extends from the brick class.
Note: Its class name is clay brick, which makes its previous name "Brick2" readable.
It contains changes from the awt to javafx.
It contains changes of class variables according to Bob's code convention.
ClayBrick(Point2D, Dimension2D, Group) - Constructor for class project.chenlin_17.Views.ClayBrick
This constructor builds the clay brick(with defined boarder color and inner color) and adds its view to the game board.
ClayBrick(Point2D, Dimension2D, Image, Group) - Constructor for class project.chenlin_17.Views.ClayBrick
This constructor builds the image brick adn adds its view to the game board.
click() - Method in enum class project.chenlin_17.tools.SoundEffect
This function allows the player to hear the music.
Its default playing status is just play once.
Complete() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.CharacterOptionsController
This function is intended for building the world according to the user's choice.
ContinueButtonOnClicked() - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.PauseMenuController
This function allows the player to come back to the current game setting.
Crack - Class in project.chenlin_17.Views
This crack class gets and sets the crack property.
It is seperated from the original brick class.
Crack(int, int, Brick) - Constructor for class project.chenlin_17.Views.Crack
This constructor sets the basic setting for the crack.
CRACK_SECTIONS - Variable in class project.chenlin_17.Views.Crack

createWarning(String, String) - Method in class project.chenlin_17.Controller.LogInController
This function sets the default viewing for warning window.
It is created for maintainability.
